text.p: Shares in Finnish telecommunications group Nokia Oy made a test on resistance of a record 340.00 markka on Friday in modest 50 million markka volume.
At 1328/1028 GMT, Nokia rose 3.00 markka to touch 340.00 markka for a second time during the session, but then pulled back slightly to 339.50 markka.

One broker cited strength in Ericsson as a factor which could help push Nokia through its year's best and all-time intrasession high of 340.00 markka -- which according to Reuters graphics it last hit on September 15 1995.
Reuters graphics adjusts share prices for share splits.
